snippet: A federal panel ruled that all concussion-related lawsuits brought by retired N.H.L. players would be consolidated into a single suit and heard by the United States District Court in St. Paul, Minn.
abstract: Federal panel rules that all concussion-related lawsuits brought by retired NHL players will be consolidated into single suit and heard by the United States District Court in St Paul, Minn.
lead_paragraph: A federal panel ruled that all concussion-related lawsuits brought by retired N.H.L. players would be consolidated into a single suit and heard by the United States District Court in St. Paul, Minn.
